task.title: Share an object With Another Collection
task.shortdesc: CWRC provides the option to have an object available for viewing in more than one collection. This means that users only have to upload an object once.

step.cmd: Click on the Share tab in the object navigation bar.
Click on Share with another collection.
Add the name of the folder in the Share with another collection form.
Optional: If you would like to notify project members that you are sharing this object, check Send notification? And add the name of the user(s) that you would like to inform.

info.p: When you notify users, they will receive a message in their CWRC dashboard.

p.b: Now the object will be available to view and edit in both the original location of the object and the collection it has been shared with.
